skinname-purple:
{{Notranslate}}

This this is the name of the skin.
purple-browsermsg: This is an error message shown to users of Internet Explorer 8 and older versions. $1 is the site name of the wiki.
purple-profile: Menu label shown for logged-in users as the label of the menu containing their personal tools (e.g. user page link, preferences link, etc.); for anons the message [[MediaWiki:Login]] is used as the menu label for that same menu.
